test macros


macros to be used within tests


FTEST

#define FTEST(name) void name(bool *out_error)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: declares a test

FTEST_ERROR_EMPTY

#define FTEST_ERROR_EMPTY() printf_s("%s (%i)
", __FILE__, __LINE__); *out_error = false
type: C preprocessor definition
description: triggers a test error

FTEST_ERROR

#define FTEST_ERROR(error) printf_s("%s (%i) : %s
", __FILE__, __LINE__, error); *out_error = false
type: C preprocessor definition
description: triggers a test error with message

FTEST_EQUAL

#define FTEST_EQUAL(value1, value2) if ((value1 == value2) == false){ printf_s("%s (%i) : %s not equal %s
", __FILE__, __LINE__, #value1, #value2); *out_error = false; }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: tests if expressions are equal

FTEST_NOT_EQUAL

#define FTEST_NOT_EQUAL(value1, value2) if ((value1 != value2) == false){ printf_s("%s (%i) : %s equal %s
", __FILE__, __LINE__, #value1, #value2); *out_error = false; }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: tests if expressions are different

FTEST_TRUE

#define FTEST_TRUE(value) if (value == false){ printf_s("%s (%i) : %s is false
", __FILE__, __LINE__, #value); *out_error = false; }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: tests if expression is true

FTEST_FALSE

#define FTEST_FALSE(value) if (value == true) { printf_s("%s (%i) : %s is true
", __FILE__, __LINE__, #value); *out_error = false; }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: tests if expression is false
